name: Nescience - A zkVM leveraging hiding properties
description: In this talk, I will be presenting Nescience, a privacy-first blockchain project that aims to enable private transactions and provide a general-purpose execution environment for classical applications. This talk serves as a detailed exploration of the multifaceted challenges, potential solutions, and alternatives that lay ahead. Audience will be aware of the challenges they might meet when building a zkVM. Moreover, I will point out some approaches used to reinforce  the project and ensure its scalability and robustness in the landscape of blockchain technology.

speakers.name: Moudy
speakers.bio: Hello, I'm Moudy. I serve as a Research Engineer with the Vac team at Status. My work revolves around exploring intriguing aspects of the blockchain realm. At present, I'm focused on developing a zkVM that aims to offer a user experience akin to today's public blockchains, yet enhanced with strong privacy functionalities
